title: Power of a Product Rule
text: For any real numbers a and b and any integer n, the power of a product rule of exponents states that $${\left(a b\right)}^n=a^n b^n$$

title: Power of a Product Rule
text: Use the power of a product rule to simplify the expression: $${\left(-2w^3\right)}^3={\left(-2\right)}^3 {\left(w^3\right)}^3$$

title: Power Rule of Exponents
text: For any real number a and positive integers m and n,the power rule of exponents states that $${\left(a^m\right)}^n=a^{m n}$$

title: Power Rule of Exponents
text: Use the power rule to simplify the expression: $$a^3 {\left(b^2\right)}^3={\left(-2\right)}^3 {\left(w^3\right)}^3=-8w^{3\times3}$$
